page.title: 04AMENITIES IN LALEHAM
page.content: As there are so many people living in all the houses in our area we wondered what there was for them to do in their spare time. We started off by asking the man in charge of Parks in the Spelthorne area.He told us that his department looked after all the roads and greens that make our roads look nice.He organises all the flower beds and shrubs to make parks pretty.The parks provide lots of open spaces to play in with swings,slides and climbing frames.They put fences round them so that dogs are kept out to make it cleaner for children to play in. Nowadays the grass isn't cut so often and not so many new facilities are built because of the lack of money. The parks are always checked for safety several times a year.
